repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: The manuscript is a commentary on the epic Rāmāyaṇa. The commentary written by Mudigonda Hari . According to New Catalogus Catalogorum the title of the commetary is Vālmikibhāva or bhāvaprakāśikā . This is an incomplete manuscript. 2 folio with list some random verses from Ayodhyākāṇḍa, Araṇyakāṇḍa at the beginning and kiśkindhākāṇḍa, sundarkāṇḍa at the end. The beggining of the manuscript of the Rāmāyaṇa with the Viṣrusahasranāma verses is a typical feature of the Southern tradition of the Rāmāyaṇa. Front or initial folio matter: Left margin : Ayodhyākāṇḍaṃ line 1 viproṣitaśca śatruṃ patipra line 2 dharmārthakāmān line 3 yasmin sasarve asthāne saṃ … line 4 hyetadasaṃ line 5 kinnāmakṛpa line 6 pāpayor asti 2nd column line 1 tayo ssu line 2 tayoḥ prā line 3 lokaviddhi The beginning of the verses 2.7.23, and then 2.20.5 to 9 probably. same folio in the right margin: araṇyakāṇḍam line 1 śṛṇu rāghāva line 2 parimṛṣṭo da line 3 yat kṛte vyasa line 4 akṛtvā na hi te line 5 śṛyatāṃ rāma ca line 6 vānarendroḥ This is broken verse. The each line is a beginning of the verses 7 to 11 from 3.68. After the 55v, a blank folio, matter in left side kiśkindhākāṇḍa line 1 4.028.018a na hi tāvad bha line 2 4.021.012a śa tasyā vacanaṃ line 3 ? line 4 4.058.004c na cintayati rā Line 5, 6 ?? line 7 4.014.013c dharmalobha line 8 4.043.009a tad evaṃ prasthitasyāsya column 2 line 1 4.033.009a śatam aśvānṛte Same folio right side sundarkāṇḍa line 1 5 .1.9. vavṛdhe rāma line 4 5.040.017a na tatra kāci line 5 5- 5.007.067a na cākulī column 2 line 3 5.036.041a mamaiva du line 4 5.036.053a pratigṛhya ta line 5 5.034.039a na māṃsaṃ rā line 6.003.005a m asi dṛṣṭavān 4.001.047a sa vipalāṃ line 7 5.049.027a na tu dharmo

msItem.title: Rāmāyaṇabhāvaprakāśikā
msItem.author: Hari Mudigonda
msItem.explicit: 55 r. 1. ṣṭadharmaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ (kli)śyante dharmmaśīlañca tasmādetau nirarthakau

support.p: Front cover is broken. Supported by the attaching thin palm leaf.

extent.measure: 2 guard folio, 55 written and 2 blank folio and 2 folio with list of random verses from diffrent parts of the chapters.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numerals in the left corner. 1-54 folio are numbered. Last folio is not numbered.
supportDesc.condition: Some folio are broken at the edges. Few wormwholes.

handNote.desc: Handwriting is not very legible, cluster words are difficult to read.

listBibl.bibl: Valmiki: Ramayana, Kandas 1-7 accessed on gretil. The Valmiki-Ramayana. Critically edited, M.S. University of Baroda. 1958-1975

encodingDesc.p: () used for the unclear reading and ??? are used for showing illegible characters.

TEI.text:
1v 1 śrīmate hayagrīvāya namaḥ . śuklāmbaradharaṃ viṣṇuṃ śaśivarṇañcaturbhujaṃ . prasannavadanandhyāyet sarvavighnopaśāntaye .. yasya dviradavaktrādyā pāriṣadyāḥ paraśśataṃ . vighnam nighnanti satataṃ viṣvaksenaṃ ta 2 māśraye śrījānakīlatāśīṣṭaśṛtadvijaphalapradaḥ . śreyase bhuyase te stu śrīrāmānāma??? paḥ . ??ṇaṃ kāra??? vālmikaṃ kavideśikaṃ śrimadrāmāyaṇaṃ sītāṃ rāmañca satamam bhaje mudigonda 3 hariḥ
55 r. 1. ṣṭadharmaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ (kli)śyante dharmmaśīlañca tasmādetau nirarthakau
